results.name: Expansion of the first column of triangle T_(1,x), T(x,y) defined in A039599; T_(1,0)= A061554, T_(1,1)= A064189, T_(1,2)= A039599, T_(1,3)= A110877, T_(1,4)= A124576.
comment: Equal to A092107*B^(-1) = A092107*A130595 as lower triangular arrays. - _Philippe Deléham_, Dec 10 2009
